detail_desc: Sleeveless playsuit in a crinkled weave with frill trims and a lined, double-layered top section. Wrapover back and press-studs on one shoulder.

Playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with buttons at the top and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Elasticated seam at the waist, patch front pockets and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Aviator-style sunglasses with a decoration on one side. Metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Aviator-style sunglasses with a decoration on one side. Metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Tights in soft microfibre with an elasticated waist.
Set with leggings and socks in soft, fine-knit cotton. Leggings in a textured knit with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Set with leggings and socks in soft, fine-knit cotton. Leggings in a textured knit with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Dungaree shorts in a soft viscose weave with frill-trimmed adjustable straps and an elasticated waist. Gathered hems with narrow elastication and a flounced trim.
Bikini top and bottoms. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a double-layer front with a laser-cut pattern and a gold-coloured metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms with laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Bikini top and bottoms. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a double-layer front with a laser-cut pattern and a gold-coloured metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms with laser-cut, scalloped edges.
A-line dress in lace with a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
A-line dress in lace with a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
A-line dress in lace with a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
A-line dress in lace with a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a cotton knit. Jumper with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a cotton knit. Jumper with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.

Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a mesh back section, high waist, lined gusset, wide sides, high-cut legs and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.

Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a mesh back section, high waist, lined gusset, wide sides, high-cut legs and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.

Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a mesh back section, high waist, lined gusset, wide sides, high-cut legs and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with decorative buttons down the front and a high, frill-trimmed elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt. Concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with decorative buttons down the front and a high, frill-trimmed elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt. Concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with pompoms on the front and sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Body in mesh and lace with a super push-up bra. Underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of joggers in twill. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of joggers in twill. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of joggers in twill. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of joggers in twill. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Braided handbag with two handles at the top and a grained imitation leather base section. Matching detachable imitation leather clutch bag with a zip at the top and lined inside. Size of handbag 12x34x37 cm. Size of clutch 16.5x23 cm.
Shirt in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and two flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Shaping bikers in microfibre. High waist with a laser-cut edge and short legs with lace-trimmed hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Shaping bikers in microfibre. High waist with a laser-cut edge and short legs with lace-trimmed hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Shaping bikers in microfibre. High waist with a laser-cut edge and short legs with lace-trimmed hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.

Bandeau bra in sturdy microfibre with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under the clothes. Concealed, soft elastication at top and bottom edge. Mesh lining.

Bandeau bra in sturdy microfibre with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under the clothes. Concealed, soft elastication at top and bottom edge. Mesh lining.

Party set with two nipple covers, 30 pieces of garment tape and two sheets of breast-lift tape. The perfect alternative to a bra under low-cut dresses and tops.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide, tie-front collar, a V-shaped opening at the top and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide, tie-front collar, a V-shaped opening at the top and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.

Calf-length dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Tapered waist with decorative pleats front and back, and long, slightly wider sleeves with gathers and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.
Blouse in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, a V-neck with a wide flounced trim, long puff sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a tapered waist.

Shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a V-neck, small stand-up collar and narrow lapels. Concealed buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
